Metadata.name: Dojima's Coffee
Metadata.author: Tekka
Metadata.description:
This feature is unlocked after obtaining the Coffee Mug key item after reaching S. Link Rank 10 (Max) with Dojima.
Interact with the kitchen after returning from the TV World to drink some of Dojima's coffee and do an activity at night.
You won't be able to drink coffee on nights with event scenes.
